tagline: Something with Markdown. And Wordpress. And XMLRPC.... What could it possibly be?
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
body: ### Comming Soon: **Markulus** is an all news Worpdress article editor for the Mac. It's based on John Grubers [Markdown](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown) and communicates with Wordpress over XMLRPC. *Soon*
name: Markulus
